name: Xynomix
tag_list: database, database-consultancy, database-support, microsoft-sql-server, oracle-database, oracle-managed-services, oracle-training, vmware
overview:
Xynomix are a Nottingham-based database services company specialising in database support, managed services and consultancy for Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server and Unix/Linux.

Services include support and consultancy at any level, from fully managed services and 24x7x365 remote database monitoring, to telephone escalation and licence advice. Packages that are tailored to an organisation’s individual needs can be easily built from here.

The overall value to these services is to help Oracle and MS SQL Server users to reduce the total cost of owning and managing complex database systems; reducing unplanned downtime whilst achieving the highest possible levels of reliability and performance.
